title: Evidence Synthesis Extraction (Systematic Review / Meta-analysis / NMA / IPD / Umbrella)

schema_version.description: Semantic-like version tag, e.g. v1.0 of v1.2.3

study_id.description: Internal opaque ID for this article (the review itself)

living_review.description: Information for living systematic reviews that are continually updated

version_number.description: Version of this living review (e.g., v1.0, v2.1)

surveillance_method.description: How new evidence is monitored (e.g., automated alerts, manual searches)

trigger_criteria.description: Criteria that trigger an update of the review

new_studies_threshold.description: Number of new studies needed to trigger update

change_in_conclusion.description: Update if new evidence changes conclusion

study_designs.description: Eligible primary study designs (e.g., RCTs, cohorts)

other_sources.description: Trial registries, grey literature, handsearching, reference lists

effect_size_computation.description: Rules for effect measure selection & transformation

conversion_rules.description: Bijv. median→mean/SD, HR uit KM, SMD↔MD

included_studies.description: Minimal per-study references used in the synthesis.

per_study_assessments.description: Detailed risk of bias assessment per included study

small_study_methods.description: Egger, Begg, contour-enhanced funnel, selection models

sensitivity_analyses.description: Sensitivity analyses to test robustness of findings

robis_assessment.description: ROBIS (Risk Of Bias In Systematic reviews) tool assessment

method.description: Estimator or approach (e.g., DL, REML, ML, Bayesian MCMC)

per_study_effects.description: Optional: study-level effect sizes contributing to the pool

pooled_effects.description: Relative effects for pairs vs reference or all pairs.

ranking.description: Optional ranking metrics per treatment (e.g., SUCRA).

contribution_matrix.description: Contribution of each direct comparison to network estimates

cinema_assessment.description: CINeMA (Confidence in Network Meta-Analysis) framework for GRADE in NMA

synthesis_id.description: Unique identifier for this synthesis (stable across document versions)

starting_certainty.description: Starting level for RCTs (high) or observational (low)

upgrade_factors.description: Factors that may increase certainty for observational studies

plausible_confounding.description: All plausible confounding would reduce effect

name.description: Short title of the PRISMA item (optional)

section.description: Section of manuscript where item should appear

PrismaItemId.description: Enumerated PRISMA 2020 checklist item or sub-item code.

items.description: AMSTAR 2 item-level ratings (1–16). Mark critical domains with critical=true.

critical_domains.description: List of item_ids marked critical in this assessment (subset of 1–16).

influential_studies.description: Studies whose exclusion substantially changes results

inclusion_criteria.description: e.g., 'only low risk of bias studies'
